actions.description:
The hobgoblin makes four attacks, each of which can be an Unarmed Strike or a Dart attack. It can also use

Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dart

actions.description: The hobgoblin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it leaves and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.
actions.name: Shadow Jaunt

actions.description:
The hobgoblin casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
At will: minor illusion, prestidigitation

1/day each: charm person, disguise self, silent image
actions.name: Spellcasting

specialTraits.description: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
specialTraits.name: Unarmored Defense
